item.title: Vocabel für Revision am 9. Dezember 2021
item.description: December 2021: topic 4 unit 7 s.83 wrong - evident Topic 4 – Human rights, human wrongs Seite 88 wrong [rɒŋ] Unrecht, Schuld migration pact [maɪˈɡreɪʃn pækt] Migrationsabkommen hard-line [ˈhɑːd laɪn] hart, kompromisslos jobless rate [ˌdʒɒbləs ˈreɪt] Arbeitslosenquote campaigner [kæmˈpeɪnə] AktivistIn shame [ʃeɪm] Schande concerning [kənˈsɜːnɪŋ] besorgniserregend Seite 89

item.title: Article am 14. November 2021
item.description: Young Employees How is the situation about employment for our younger generation especially in Austria? In the meanwhile, more and more attention is paid to the unemployed younger generation so that they can find a job. But through the covid pandemic the numbers have not decreased because young people are usually the first to be terminated when the staff is getting cut. Unfortunately, the willing to work hard and the motivation of the youth is decreasing through the time.

item.title: Blogpost am 7. Oktober 2021
item.description: Economic growth Posted by Denk Jonas 11th October 2021 One simple thing in economy is, two similar companies can´t grow both at the same time. As a result of this, if one company grows another similar one must decrease. A simple example: If the company Adidas let their shoes produce by a different company in another country, the new commissioned company would grow brutally while the old producing brand would go to insolvency.
